inclusion.criterion: elective PCI due to right coronary artery occlusion
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of chronic respiratory condition and PHTN
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) or coronary artery bypass graft surgery (CABG)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. Smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years.
